content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you could make it. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think a good price for the apartment would be 1000 Euro per month. It's a new building in the city center after all.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1000 Euro is too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: How about 1100 Euro then? That's a good deal for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's still too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 1200 Euro? That's the lowest I can go for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1300 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Max. See you on the 1st of next month with the signed contract and the deposit.
name: Max Müller from Germany
